name: Introduction Template
subject: Partnership Opportunity with {{school_name}}
content:
Dear {{contact_person}},

I hope this email finds you well. My name is [Your Name] and I'm reaching out from Maximally to explore a potential partnership with {{school_name}} in {{city}}.

We specialize in educational technology solutions that can help enhance student learning outcomes. I'd love to discuss how we can support {{school_name}}'s educational goals.

Would you be available for a brief call next week?

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Maximally Team

name: Product Demo Template
subject: Free Demo for {{school_name}} - Educational Technology
content:
Hello {{contact_person}},

I wanted to reach out to {{school_name}} in {{city}} to offer a complimentary demonstration of our educational platform.

Our solution has helped schools increase student engagement by 40% on average. I believe {{school_name}} could greatly benefit from our technology.

Could we schedule a 15-minute demo at your convenience?

Thank you for your time,
[Your Name]
Maximally

name: Follow-up Template
subject: Following up on our conversation - {{school_name}}
content:
Hi {{contact_person}},

I wanted to follow up on my previous email regarding the partnership opportunity with {{school_name}}.

I understand you're busy managing {{school_name}} in {{city}}, but I believe our platform could provide significant value to your students and teachers.

Would you prefer a quick phone call or email exchange to discuss this further?

Looking forward to hearing from you,
[Your Name]
Maximally

name: Case Study Template
subject: How Schools Like {{school_name}} Improved Student Outcomes
content:
Dear {{contact_person}},

I hope you're having a great week at {{school_name}}!

I wanted to share a success story from a school similar to yours in {{city}}. They saw a 35% improvement in student performance after implementing our platform.

I'd love to discuss how {{school_name}} could achieve similar results. Are you available for a brief conversation this week?

Best,
[Your Name]
Maximally Team

name: Value Proposition Template
subject: Transform Education at {{school_name}} with Maximally
content:
Hello {{contact_person}},

As an educational leader at {{school_name}} in {{city}}, you're always looking for ways to improve student outcomes.

- Interactive learning modules
- Real-time progress tracking
- Personalized learning paths

Would you like to see how {{school_name}} could benefit? I can arrange a personalized demo.

name: Urgent Opportunity Template

content:
Hi {{contact_person}},

Only 5 spots remaining. Is {{school_name}} interested in being part of this exclusive program?

Maximally

name: Research-Based Template
subject: Evidence-Based Solutions for {{school_name}}
content:
Dear {{contact_person}},

Recent educational research shows that technology-enhanced learning can improve student engagement by up to 60%.

At {{school_name}} in {{city}}, I believe you're committed to giving students the best possible education. Our research-backed platform aligns with this mission.

Would you like to review the research findings and see how they apply to {{school_name}}?

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
Maximally Research Team

name: Personal Connection Template
subject: Supporting {{school_name}}'s Educational Mission
content:
Hello {{contact_person}},

As someone passionate about education, I was impressed by {{school_name}}'s commitment to student success in {{city}}.

I believe our platform could amplify the great work you're already doing at {{school_name}}. We've helped similar schools enhance their educational programs significantly.

I'd love to learn more about {{school_name}}'s specific goals and see how we can support them.

Could we schedule a brief call?

Best wishes,
[Your Name]
Maximally

name: Problem-Solution Template
subject: Solving Common Challenges at {{school_name}}
content:
Hi {{contact_person}},

Many schools in {{city}} face similar challenges: keeping students engaged, tracking progress effectively, and supporting diverse learning needs.

I'd like to show you how {{school_name}} can address these challenges with our comprehensive platform. We've developed solutions specifically for schools like yours.

Are you available for a 20-minute discussion about {{school_name}}'s current challenges and our solutions?

Thank you,
[Your Name]
Maximally Solutions Team

name: Community Impact Template
subject: Empowering {{school_name}} to Shape the Future
content:
Dear {{contact_person}},

{{school_name}} plays a vital role in shaping the future of students in {{city}}. We want to support that mission.

Our educational platform has helped schools create more engaging, effective learning environments. Students at partner schools report higher satisfaction and better outcomes.

I'd love to discuss how {{school_name}} could join our community of forward-thinking educational institutions.

When would be a good time to connect?

With appreciation,
[Your Name]
Maximally Community Team

name: Chandigarh Intro – AI Competition Invite
subject: AI Competition Invite for {{school_name}}
content:
Hi {{contact_person}},

We organize fun, beginner-friendly competitions that help students build real-world projects.

We recently hosted a Startup Competition where students from {{school_name}} took part — and did really well. Now, we’re back with something new.

We’re hosting an online AI competition open to all students in {{city}}. It’s free, team-friendly, and doesn’t need coding skills. Students can use tools like Canva, ChatGPT, or anything they’re comfortable with.

Our last event saw 1000+ students across India. This time, we’re expecting even more.

Can I share a poster and signup link with you? Would love to see {{school_name}} represented again.

Best,  
Rishul Chanana  
Founder, Maximally  
📞 +91-9041260790  
🌐 maximally.in
